product_name: New Balance Minimus HI-REZ Road-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: Get a more vivid sensation of the ground beneath your feet with the New Balance Minimus HI-REZ Road-Running Shoes. They feature independent pods of cushioning that move naturally with your feet. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. IMEVA injection-molded EVA foam midsoles offer firm, yet flexible, cushioning. Comfortable synthetic/mesh uppers with FantomFit offer lightweight support. Rubber outsoles provide lightweight performance without compromising grip or stability. Closeout.
short_description: Get a more vivid sensation of the ground beneath your feet with the New Balance Minimus HI-REZ Road-Running Shoes. They feature independent pods of cushioning that move naturally with your feet.
